<S>1161</S> I commend<S>4921</S> unto you<S>5213</S> Phebe<S>5402</S> our<S>2257</S> sister<S>79</S>, which is<S>5607</S> a servant<S>1249</S> of the church<S>1577</S> which<S>3588</S> is at<S>1722</S> Cenchrea<S>2747</S>:
That<S>2443</S> ye receive<S>4327</S> her<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, as becometh<S>516</S> saints<S>40</S>, and<S>2532</S> that ye assist<S>3936</S> her<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> whatsoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> business<S>4229</S> she hath need<S>5535</S> of you<S>5216</S>: for<S>1063</S> she<S>3778</S> <S>846</S> hath been<S>1096</S> a succourer<S>4368</S> of many<S>4183</S>, and<S>2532</S> of myself<S>846</S> <S>1700</S> also<S>2532</S>.
Greet<S>782</S> Priscilla<S>4252</S> and<S>2532</S> Aquila<S>207</S> my<S>3450</S> helpers<S>4904</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>:
Who<S>3748</S> have<S>5294</S> for<S>5228</S> my<S>3450</S> life<S>5590</S> laid down<S>5294</S> their own<S>1438</S> necks<S>5137</S>: unto whom<S>3739</S> not<S>3756</S> only<S>3441</S> I<S>1473</S> give thanks<S>2168</S>, but<S>235</S> also<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> the churches<S>1577</S> of the Gentiles<S>1484</S>.
Likewise<S>2532</S> greet the church<S>1577</S> that is in<S>2596</S> their<S>846</S> house<S>3624</S>. Salute<S>782</S> my<S>3450</S> wellbeloved<S>27</S> Epaenetus<S>1866</S>, who<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> the firstfruits<S>536</S> of Achaia<S>882</S> unto<S>1519</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
Greet<S>782</S> Mary<S>3137</S>, who<S>3748</S> bestowed<S>2872</S> much<S>4183</S> labour<S>2872</S> on<S>1519</S> us<S>2248</S>.
Salute<S>782</S> Andronicus<S>408</S> and<S>2532</S> Junia<S>2458</S>, my<S>3450</S> kinsmen<S>4773</S>, and<S>2532</S> my<S>3450</S> fellowprisoners<S>4869</S>, who<S>3748</S> are<S>1526</S> of note<S>1978</S> among<S>1722</S> the apostles<S>652</S>, who<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> were<S>1096</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> before<S>4253</S> me<S>1700</S>.
Greet<S>782</S> Amplias<S>291</S> my<S>3450</S> beloved<S>27</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>.
Salute<S>782</S> Urbane<S>3773</S>, our<S>2257</S> helper<S>4904</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, and<S>2532</S> Stachys<S>4720</S> my<S>3450</S> beloved<S>27</S>.
Salute<S>782</S> Apelles<S>559</S> approved<S>1384</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S>. Salute<S>782</S> them<S>3588</S> which are of<S>1537</S> Aristobulus'<S>711</S> household. <sup>household: or, friends</sup>
Salute<S>782</S> Herodion<S>2267</S> my<S>3450</S> kinsman<S>4773</S>. Greet<S>782</S> them<S>3588</S> that be of<S>1537</S> the household of Narcissus<S>3488</S>, which<S>3588</S> are<S>5607</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>. <sup>household: or, friends</sup>
Salute<S>782</S> Tryphena<S>5170</S> and<S>2532</S> Tryphosa<S>5173</S>, who labour<S>2872</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>. Salute<S>782</S> the beloved<S>27</S> Persis<S>4069</S>, which<S>3748</S> laboured<S>2872</S> much<S>4183</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>.
Salute<S>782</S> Rufus<S>4504</S> chosen<S>1588</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> mother<S>3384</S> and<S>2532</S> mine<S>1700</S>.
Salute<S>782</S> Asyncritus<S>799</S>, Phlegon<S>5393</S>, Hermas<S>2057</S>, Patrobas<S>3969</S>, Hermes<S>2060</S>, and<S>2532</S> the brethren<S>80</S> which are with<S>4862</S> them<S>846</S>.
Salute<S>782</S> Philologus<S>5378</S>, and<S>2532</S> Julia<S>2456</S>, Nereus<S>3517</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> sister<S>79</S>, and<S>2532</S> Olympas<S>3652</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> the saints<S>40</S> which are with<S>4862</S> them<S>846</S>.
Salute<S>782</S> one another<S>240</S> with<S>1722</S> an holy<S>40</S> kiss<S>5370</S>. The churches<S>1577</S> of Christ<S>5547</S> salute<S>782</S> you<S>5209</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> I beseech<S>3870</S> you<S>5209</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, mark<S>4648</S> them which cause<S>4160</S> divisions<S>1370</S> and<S>2532</S> offences<S>4625</S> contrary<S>3844</S> to the doctrine<S>1322</S> which<S>3739</S> ye<S>5210</S> have learned<S>3129</S>; and<S>2532</S> avoid<S>1578</S> them<S>575</S> <S>846</S>.
For<S>1063</S> they that are such<S>5108</S> serve<S>1398</S> not<S>3756</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, but<S>235</S> their own<S>1438</S> belly<S>2836</S>; and<S>2532</S> by<S>1223</S> good words<S>5542</S> and<S>2532</S> fair speeches<S>2129</S> deceive<S>1818</S> the hearts<S>2588</S> of the simple<S>172</S>.
For<S>1063</S> your<S>5216</S> obedience<S>5218</S> is come abroad<S>864</S> unto<S>1519</S> all<S>3956</S> men. I am glad<S>5463</S> therefore<S>3767</S> on<S>1909</S> your<S>5213</S> behalf<S>1909</S>: but yet<S>1161</S> I would have<S>2309</S> you<S>5209</S> wise<S>4680</S> unto<S>1519</S> that which is<S>1511</S> good<S>3303</S> <S>18</S>, and<S>1161</S> simple<S>185</S> concerning<S>1519</S> evil<S>2556</S>. <sup>simple: or, harmless</sup>
And<S>1161</S> the God<S>2316</S> of peace<S>1515</S> shall bruise<S>4937</S> Satan<S>4567</S> under<S>5259</S> your<S>5216</S> feet<S>4228</S> shortly<S>1722</S> <S>5034</S>. The grace<S>5485</S> of our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> be with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S>. Amen<S>281</S>. <sup>bruise: or, tread</sup>
Timotheus<S>5095</S> my<S>3450</S> workfellow<S>4904</S>, and<S>2532</S> Lucius<S>3066</S>, and<S>2532</S> Jason<S>2394</S>, and<S>2532</S> Sosipater<S>4989</S>, my<S>3450</S> kinsmen<S>4773</S>, salute<S>782</S> you<S>5209</S>.
I<S>1473</S> Tertius<S>5060</S>, who wrote<S>1125</S> this epistle<S>1992</S>, salute<S>782</S> you<S>5209</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>.
Gaius<S>1050</S> mine<S>3450</S> host<S>3581</S>, and<S>2532</S> of the whole<S>3650</S> church<S>1577</S>, saluteth<S>782</S> you<S>5209</S>. Erastus<S>2037</S> the chamberlain<S>3623</S> of the city<S>4172</S> saluteth<S>782</S> you<S>5209</S>, and<S>2532</S> Quartus<S>2890</S> a brother<S>80</S>.
The grace<S>5485</S> of our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> be with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S> all<S>3956</S>. Amen<S>281</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> to him that is of power<S>1410</S> to stablish<S>4741</S> you<S>5209</S> according<S>2596</S> to my<S>3450</S> gospel<S>2098</S>, and<S>2532</S> the preaching<S>2782</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, according<S>2596</S> to the revelation<S>602</S> of the mystery<S>3466</S>, which was kept secret<S>4601</S> since the world began<S>5550</S> <S>166</S>,
But<S>1161</S> now<S>3568</S> is made manifest<S>5319</S>, and<S>5037</S> by<S>1223</S> the scriptures<S>1124</S> of the prophets<S>4397</S>, according<S>2596</S> to the commandment<S>2003</S> of the everlasting<S>166</S> God<S>2316</S>, made known<S>1107</S> to<S>1519</S> all<S>3956</S> nations<S>1484</S> for<S>1519</S> the obedience<S>5218</S> of faith<S>4102</S>:
To God<S>2316</S> only<S>3441</S> wise<S>4680</S>, be glory<S>1391</S> through<S>1223</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S>. Amen<S>281</S>. <sup>Written<S>1125</S> to<S>4314</S> the Romans<S>4514</S> from<S>575</S> Corinthus<S>2882</S>, and sent by<S>1223</S> Phebe<S>5402</S> servant<S>1249</S> of the church<S>1577</S> at<S>1722</S> Cenchrea<S>2747</S>.</sup>
